title: Atlas Meat-Free Delicatessen
description: Est. Jun 2014 vegetarian deli and sandwich counter at Yellow Green Farmers' Market, turned vegan in 2015. Offers sandwiches, sides, by-the-pound veggie meats. Select a sandwich from the menu or build-your-own. Sample sides might be waldorf chick'n, Mediterranean pasta salad, potato salad, roasted cauliflower. The "meats" include sausages, ground burger, steak strips, and sliced turkâ€™y.
